translations.translation: except for boiling water and scalding pus -
Except boiling water and benumbing cold:
save boiling water and wash of the wounds;
except boiling water and pus,
Except hot boiling water and hot pus discharged from the people of hell.
Except Hamim, and Ghassaq
But boiling and intensely cold water,
save boiling water and pus
Save boiling water and a paralysing cold:
save boiling water and a stinking fluid --
Save scalding water and corruption.
except boiling water and pus,
Save a boiling fluid and a fluid, dark, murky, intensely cold,
Except boiling water, and dirty wound discharges.
except boiling water and pus
Except boiling water, and freezing hail.
Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -

[78:25] except boiling water, of extreme temperatures, and pus (read ghasāqan or ghassāqan, which is the vile matter that is emitted by the [bodies of the] inhabitants of the Fire), which is what they will [indeed] taste. They are given this pair [of tortures],
(Save boiling water and a paralysing cold) and it is also said this means: filthy water:

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { إِلاَّ حَمِيماً وَغَسَّاقاً } فالحَميمُ: الحَارُ
 والغَسَّاقُ: ما يَسيلُ من صَديدِهِم، ويَتقطعُ من جِلودِهِم

translations.translation:
And His saying, {Except for boiling and steaming}, so boiling is hot.


The ghasaq is what flows from their sandals and cuts through their skin.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
لذلك لم يشربوا في النشأة الأخرى { إِلاَّ حَمِيماً } ماءً حاراً
 سخن بنيران غضبهم وشهواتهم
 بحيث يقطع أمعالهم من شدة حرارته


{ وَغَسَّاقاً } [النبأ: 25] صديداً يسيل من جراحات أهل النار بدل ما يأكلون ويشربون من أموال اليتامى والمظلومين ظلماً
